thread.title: Stocks waver in midday trade; IBM weighs on Dow average
thread.title_full: Stocks waver in midday trade; IBM weighs on Dow average - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Stocks waver in midday trade; IBM weighs on Dow average
text:
By ALEX VEIGA
AP Business Writer Stocks are wavering between small gains and losses as some weak earnings reports weigh on the market.
IBM sank 6 percent Tuesday after the company reported that its revenue fell for the 14th quarter in a row.
Harley-Davidson plunged 15 percent after reporting a drop in profit and cutting its forecasts for motorcycle shipments.
Pizza Hut and KFC owner Yum Brands gained 4 percent after saying it would spin off its struggling China business.
The Dow Jones industrial average slipped 18 points, or 0.1 percent, to 17,211 as of 11:45 a.m. Eastern time.
The Standard & Poor's 500 gave up a point to 2,032. The Nasdaq composite edged down 13 points, or 0.3 percent, to 4,891.
Bond prices fell. The yield on the 10-year Treasury note rose to 2.07 percent.
